name: clickstream-analysis
description: Tracking data about page visits by user such as "visits count by page", "visit time by page", "time average by page", "clicks on links" and other metrics.
author: Raul Quispe <relaxedchild@gmail.com>

scripts.start: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/index.js
scripts.generate:user: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/scripts/seeders.js
scripts.test:newVisit: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/scripts/newVisit.js
